name: Level 5
overview: Level 5 is a 2D top down shooter set in a maze. The player is trapped inside a giant alien space pod and must reach the renowned Level-5 to escape. Cybernauts (war robots) want to kill him but he can't destroy all enemies because they regenerate into new forms. On each level player must find the lift to the next level. In special places, he can regenerate ammo and energy (but he needs to spend points). He can use also use consoles to view maps.
